headline: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum: Brighten & Fade Dark Spots
description: Unleash your skin's radiance with GlowBoost 10.0% Vitamin C Serum. Specifically formulated for oily and combination skin, this powerful serum targets dark spots and promotes a brighter, more even complexion.

ingredients.description: Infused with 10.0% Vitamin C for powerful brightening and dark spot reduction, complemented by Hyaluronic Acid to help maintain skin hydration.

benefits.description: Achieve a visibly brighter complexion and effectively fade the appearance of dark spots, revealing a more luminous and uniform skin tone.

usage.instructions: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen
tips: Apply 2–3 drops to clean, dry skin.
Use once daily in the morning.
Always follow with a broad-spectrum sunscreen.

precautions: Individuals with sensitive skin may experience a mild tingling sensation upon application.
